title: [GSoC Snippet] 26/05/2014
author: Maciej (Developer Website)
content:
[text] anwered Tim comments on my github
[text] answered Tim post on Google Groups
[code] fixed repositories regarding to Tim posts
[bug] on gatekeper (cannot get ?id=0123) - resolved, OAuth needs an callback url. I've had to update configuration on GitHub
[code] moved prose to submodule
[bug] prose redirects to prose.io instead of origin website - resolved, I've had to update oauth.json and rebuild the prose application
[code] started writing new wikilinks.rb
[code] started writing automatic permalink creator.rb

Plans for next days (what should be done):
[code] write new plugins permalinks.rb and wikilinks.rb
[design] prepare all mockups
[configuration] configurate prose.io in pinoss.github.io
[code] write script for automatic deploy (jekyll-hook?, crontab?)
Originally posted on pino IT / ruby / developer
